channel.title: Python on Shiglass
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Shiglass

item.title: Callable
item.description: Callable は type hint で関数で呼び出すことが出来る。 class PaymentProcessor: def __init__(self, authorize_type: str): if authorizer_type == 'sms': self.authorize = authorize_sms elif authorizer_type == 'email': self.authorize = authorize_email Callable の使い方は list に 実引数のリスト と 返り値の型 を記載する。 Callable[[引数], 返り値] AuthorizeFunction = Callable[[], bool] class PaymentProcessor: def __init__(self, authorize: AuthorizerFunction): self.authorize = authorize
